casebody.data:
Brenda MILLER, Petitioner-Respondent,
v.
STATE-OPERATED SCHOOL DISTRICT OF the CITY OF NEWARK, Essex County, Respondent-Petitioner. C-607 September Term 2018
081771 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 8, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000078-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
